hypothesis_content.title: MSTR Extreme Daily Deviation Reversion as BTC Proxy
hypothesis_content.statement: When MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates more than 15% from its implied Bitcoin holding value (based on BTC holdings and cash/debt adjustments) intraday, it will revert 70% of the way toward fair value within 3 trading days when general market regime is NEUTRAL or BULL.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a leveraged Bitcoin proxy with occasional dislocations due to equity market dynamics, options flow, or institutional rebalancing. In stable-to-bullish crypto regimes, extreme deviations create arbitrage opportunities as market makers and arbs correct mispricing relative to underlying BTC value.
entry_conditions: Deviation occurs during US equity market hours (9:30-16:00 ET)
Enter mean-reversion position at market close
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Deviations persist or expand beyond 20% in >30% of signals OR correlation between MSTR and BTC breaks down during mean reversion period.
